title: LFM - JG and Supp - Silver+ Only
body:
Hey guys I'm Deep Sanity,
So im starting up a new ranked team for silver+ only maybe high bronze for some exception.
I have an experience in ranked teams, i have been playing in teams since late s3.
I am Silver 5 and heading up, but i have alot more to improve in and i think it would be better in a team.
also communication will be a vital in this team so we will use either skype teamspeak or curse.
i will make up a schedule for when games will be made if needed.

Top - Taken
Jungle -  Taken
Mid - Taken
Adc - Taken
Supp - Free

Feel free to add me in game or just make a post in here - Thanks :)
- Deep Sanity

replies.body: I am willing to learn support if it is still open add twisted s I d if it is still open

Silver 5 atm, I play support, mainly thresh and morgana but can also play ali, janna and annie. I am quite interested in joining your team. and am willing to learn and adapt as time goes by. ple get back to me.
IGN: ggNinja
Gold 5 Mar3thyu I can play jg if you want

So... I understand that I am only in bronze (oh no) but I am a support main (which is seemingly quite rare). I am a very team orientated player. I can play just about all supports to an extent, but I will put in **A LOT** of effort to learn the supports you guys want that fit the team and i will be very dedicated. Just give me a chance ^_^ thanks for your time.
